receiving-po.name: üì¶ Receiving PO Audit
receiving-po.description: Mixed retail products (UPC/EAN) from purchase order
receiving-po.notes: Typical receiving scenario. Expect mix of domestic (UPC-A) and international (EAN-13) barcodes.

location-labels.name: üìç Location Label Batch
location-labels.notes: Location labels MUST be unique. Duplicates will break putaway/picking. Use consistent naming convention.

label-print-qa.name: üè∑Ô∏è Label Print QA
label-print-qa.notes: Same barcode printed multiple times is normal. Focus on checksum validation and print quality.

internal-sku.name: üîß Internal SKU Labels
internal-sku.notes: Internal SKUs typically use Code 128 for alphanumeric flexibility. Ensure consistent format.

mixed-operations.name: üîÄ Mixed Operations
mixed-operations.description: Combination of product UPCs and location codes
mixed-operations.notes: Common in cycle count or inventory audit scenarios. Validate both product and location codes.

small-product.name: üìè Small Product Labels
small-product.notes: UPC-E and EAN-8 for small items. Verify scanner support before deployment.
